item.description:
Enjoy a FUN evening learning easy line dances by a professional instructor!

It doesn't matter if you are coordinated or not, this is for all levels and everyone is welcomed! That includes MEN! Don't be shy - we want you there!

If you have never been to Tatnuck, be sure to come early or stay afterwards to browse the store.  Lots of good stuff in addition to books, including a great cafe.

Some of you may have been at Lynne's Fundraiser and participated in the line dancing there.  This is the same instructor so you know it's going to be great!

Please arrive by 6:45 pm.

Lessons are from 7 pm to 8 pm

Join me earlier in the cafe for a light bite around 5:30 pm.
item.how_to_find_us: Go to the event room in the back of the store.
item.why: It's going to be a blast and anyone can do it!
item.name: Country Line Dance Lessons
